document_data.name: Aldwin Graves
document_data.mainbody: Speaker '''Aldwin Graves''' was a councilor of [[Helm's Hold]] who lived in the fortress-city during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Due to his position, he held great sway and influence over the people of his home city.{{Template:Cite game/Neverwinter}}
document_data.Relationships: Aldwin had a protective brother named [[Corlan Graves|Corlan]] as well as a wife, for whom he greatly cared.
document_data.History:
When the [[Ashmadai]] overran Helm's Hold ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Aldwin ignored the warnings of his brother and remained in his home on [[Scar Alley]]. The [[devil]]-worshiping cultists briefly kidnapped the councilman, but were thwarted by the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]], who was hired by Corlan.

After the incident, Councilor Graves agreed to go into hiding, though it was believed to be more for the safety of his wife rather than his own well-being.
